ApiRole.title: API role
ApiRole.description: An API role is a list of endpoints, operations, and fields that are available to a set of callers through API calls

applicableOnThisPlanetClass.title: Applicable on this planet class
applicableOnThisPlanetClass.description: Whether this role is applicable on this planet's planet class

applicablePlanetClasses.title: Applicable planet classes
applicablePlanetClasses.description: The set of planet classes in which this role can be used

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this role

BatchProcess.title: Batch process
BatchProcess.description: A batch process is an automated process that can be run in the background. Batch processes can be scheduled to run automatically or can be started explicitly via the appropriate API call.

distributed.title: Distributed
distributed.description: Flag indicating whether the batch process is distributed

processHistoryId.title: Process history id
processHistoryId.description: The RestId of the newly created `ProcessHistory` when a batch process is started

processId.title: Process id
processId.description: Id of the newly created process when a batch process is started. This property is only populated when starting a batch process, and not when otherwise viewing the details of a batch process.
processId.x-gw-deprecatedReason: This field has been deprecated. The `processId` refers to the ID column of the ProcessHistory element created for the new batch run and should not be used to view the ProcessHistory. Use the `processHistoryId` field instead.

wasStopped.title: Was stopped
wasStopped.description: Flag indicating whether the batch process was successfully stopped (a `false` value means the batch process was not already running). This property is only populated when stopping a batch process, and not when otherwise viewing the details of a batch process.

workQueueStatus.title: Work queue status
workQueueStatus.description: Status of the associated work queue, if any

BatchProcessArguments.title: Batch process arguments
BatchProcessArguments.description: The arguments with which a batch process can be started

dbconsistencycheck.title: DBConsistencyCheck
dbconsistencycheck.description: Arguments for the DBConsistencyCheck batch process

purgeAsyncApiRequests.title: PurgeAsyncApiRequests
purgeAsyncApiRequests.description: Arguments for the PurgeAsyncApiRequests batch process

syncAdminAppEvents.title: SyncAdminAppEvents
syncAdminAppEvents.description: Arguments for the SyncAdminAppEvents batch process

DBConsistencyCheckArguments.title: DBConsistencyCheckArguments
DBConsistencyCheckArguments.description: Arguments for the DBConsistencyCheck batch process

checkTypes.title: Check types
checkTypes.description: Array of selected codes (from the ConsistencyCheckType typelist)

rerunKey.title: Rerun key
rerunKey.description: Key of previous run, if the batch process is a rerun of that run

DatabaseConsistencyCheck.title: Database consistency check
DatabaseConsistencyCheck.description: Details of the consistency check run

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the consistency check run

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Length of time taken by this consistency check run

endTime.title: End time
endTime.description: Time at which this consistency check run ended

errors.title: Errors
errors.description: Number of errors encountered by the consistency check run

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier of this consistency check run

key.title: Key
key.description: Key of this run to be used if it should be rerun

startTime.title: Start time
startTime.description: Time at which this consistency check run started

totalChecks.title: Total checks
totalChecks.description: Total number of consistency checks that ran in this run

code.title: Code
code.description: The code for this API extension bundle

definition.title: Definition
definition.description: Definition of the API extension bundle

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of this API extension bundle

code.title: Code
code.description: The code for this API extension bundle

definition.title: Definition
definition.description: Definition of the API extension bundle

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of this API extension bundle

shadowed.title: Shadowed
shadowed.description: Designates whether or not the API extension bundle is shadowed by a design-mode definition

PlanetClass.title: Planet class
PlanetClass.description: The stages of code promotion throughout the software development lifecycle (also known as Orbit)

lower.title: Lower
lower.description: Whether this planet class is considered a lower environment

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the planet class, such as `staging` or `preprod`

ProcessHistory.title: Process history
ProcessHistory.description: Contains information about the history of the batch process

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

ranToCompletion.title: Ran to completion
ranToCompletion.description: Whether or not the process ran to completion, or failed or was interrupted

returnValue.title: Return value
returnValue.description: Return value from the batch process, or null if batch process has not completed, or does not have a return value

scheduled.title: Scheduled
scheduled.description: Whether this was a scheduled run

workQueue.title: Work queue status
workQueue.description: Status of the associated work queue, if any

ProcessHistoryBase.title: Process status
ProcessHistoryBase.description: Contains information about the status of the batch process

dateCompleted.title: Date completed
dateCompleted.description: The date the process finished, if it has in fact finished

dateCreated.title: Date created
dateCreated.description: The date and time that the batch process was last requested to start

failureReason.title: Failure reason
failureReason.description: If the process failed to complete, the reason why it failed

opsCompleted.title: Operations completed
opsCompleted.description: The number of operations the process completed so far

serverId.title: Server ID
serverId.description: Server that ran (or is running) this batch process

startDate.title: Start date
startDate.description: The date and time that the batch process was last started

ProcessStatus.title: Process status
ProcessStatus.description: Contains information about the status of the batch process

opsExpected.title: Operations expected
opsExpected.description: The number of operations expected to be completed

progress.title: Progress
progress.description: Progress in the form `x of y` where `x` is the amount of work completed and `y` is the total amount of work. If `y` is unknown, returns just `x`.

PurgeAsyncApiRequestsArguments.title: PurgeAsyncApiRequestsArguments
PurgeAsyncApiRequestsArguments.description: Arguments for the PurgeAsyncApiRequests batch process

purgeDaysOld.title: Purge days old
purgeDaysOld.description: The number of days to keep async API request rows before they can be deleted

SyncAdminAppEventsArguments.title: SyncAdminAppEventsArguments
SyncAdminAppEventsArguments.description: Arguments for the SyncAdminAppEvents batch process

adminEntityNames.title: Admin entity names for "AppEvents" sync
adminEntityNames.description: Array of admin entity names to be synced with App Events

WorkQueueStatus.title: Work queue status
WorkQueueStatus.description: Contains information about the work queue for a distributed batch process

checkedOutCount.title: Number of checked out work items
checkedOutCount.description: Number of work items checked out by workers

failedCount.title: Number of failed work items
failedCount.description: Number of work items that failed during processing

numActiveWorkItems.title: Number of active work items
numActiveWorkItems.description: The number of active work items
